data.text: A few dead flies in a bottle of perfume cause all the perfume to stink.
If people think sensibly, it will lead them to do what is right;
Even while foolish people walk along the road,
Do not quit working for a ruler when he is angry with you;
There is something else that I have seen here on this earth,
They appoint foolish people to have important positions,
They allow slaves to ride on horses like rich people usually do,
It is possible that those who dig pits
If you work in a quarry,
If your axe is not sharp [DOU],
If a snake bites a man before he charms/tames it,
Wise people say [MTY] what is sensible, and because of that, people honor them;
When foolish people start to talk, they say things that are foolish,
They talk ◄too much/without ceasing►.
Foolish people become so exhausted by the work that they do
Terrible things will happen to the people of a nation whose ruler is a foolish young man,
But a nation will prosper if its ruler is from a ◄noble/well-educated► family,
Some men are very lazy and do not repair the rafters,
Eating food and drinking wine causes us to laugh and be happy,
Do not even think about cursing the king,
